appraisal.reason: According to the newsletter, weekday confessions run from 12:15pm to 12:40pm, not 12:00pm to 12:40pm. Saturday confessions are from 5:30pm to 5:55pm, not until 6:00pm. No confessions are listed for Sundays.

name: Our Lady of Mount Carmel & St Simon Stock

appraisal.reason: According to this bulletin, Confessions are heard for half an hour before all Masses, not only Monday and Wednesday–Friday at 12:35–13:05. This includes additional times before the 6:30 pm Masses (e.g., Monday and Thursday), before all Sunday Masses, and a scheduled Confessions period at 10:00 am on Saturday. Confessions may also be arranged by appointment with the Rector.

According to the bulletin, confessions are on Monday and Friday from 12:00–12:30pm (or on request). The stated time of Mondays 11:30am–12:15pm only is incorrect. Please refer to the posted schedule for accuracy.
